OUR HUMAN RESOURCES SOFTWARE ON YOUR PHONE

Manage vacations and absences, employee hours, incidents in payroll and documents — and completely centralize talent management in your company.

Our app for employees and administrators offers quick and easy access to all these functionalities. We have different options so that employees can easily clock in and communication tools that bring teams closer together than ever before.

Many SMEs already manage Human Resources with Factorial software, centralizing and streamlining the most important HR processes. Now, with our mobile app, they do it all whenever and wherever they want.

What makes the Factorial Human Resources app so powerful?

MANAGE YOUR OFFICES

You'll have insight into which employees are in the office at all times, so that you can better manage a remote, hybrid, or office-first workforce.

CLOCK IN AND OUT EASILY

Clocking in should be the easy part! Workers can log working hours and manage their work shifts from the mobile app. Updated information automatically syncs across devices.

With the mobile application, you can clock in with:
- A clock-in and clock-out button
- Manual shift editing
- The geolocation system
- A QR code and a reader at the office entrance

STREAMLINE TIME OFF AND ABSENCE MANAGEMENT

Employees can send time off requests with the touch of a button and administrators can approve or reject them just as quickly.

Considered one of the best tools we offer, our time off manager allows you to:
- Check the number of vacation days available to each employee
- Stay aware current and upcoming absences
- Review the most up-to-date information

IMPROVED INTERNAL COMMUNICATION

Introducing Factorial's mobile application for HR management will help foster alignment and cohesiveness in your team.

Stay on top of the most recent company announcements, birthdays, work anniversaries, new hires, and events. Join and participate in different communities within your organization.

You don't have to be seated next to your team members to feel close to them!

THE SIMPLE DOCUMENTARY MANAGEMENT

Factorial is already known for optimizing and digitizing all the paperwork of the Human Resources departments, but now we have surpassed ourselves.

The latest innovation in our mobile application is that you can manage business documents as you did from your computer. Open, download, read documents, edit them, share them, delete them ... basically, do whatever you want.

You can access any file and folder any time, anywhere. No limits or restrictions.
